text: Holy profanity, Batman! The new DC show Titans clearly isn ’ t for kids. In the very first trailer for the upcoming show, Robin the Boy Wonder drops a massive F - bomb about his mentor and father figure, Batman. After some bad guys try to take Robin down and ask “ where ’ s Batman? ” Robin haughtily replies, “ F * * k Batman! ” So, there you have it, you ’ re not watching this show with your kids who are very young. ADVERTISEMENT On Thursday, DC released the new trailer for the upcoming TV series Titans, which is loosely based on the superhero group the Teen Titans, who appear various comic books, as well as the 2013 Teen Titans Go! animated series and the 2003 animated show, just called Teen Titans.
